Three Changes You Should Make To Your Website

Your website may not be performing to your expectations. We have identified three action items that may improve the effectiveness of your lawyer marketing dollars.

Optimizing your website to improve Mobile Page Speed

Securing your website with HTTPS

Targeting mobile users with Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)

Mobile Page Speed
and AMP

Your website’s mobile load time is slow. As clients increasingly turn to mobile devices to find attorneys, improving your website’s mobile page speed ensures that potential clients remain on your website, learn about your firm, and contact you for representation.

Your website does not use AMP or has a problem with its AMP implementation. According to Google, 40% of visitors leave a website if it takes more than 3 seconds to load. AMP provides a better experience for mobile users by loading pages faster.

Security

Your website is NOT secured with HTTPS. HTTPS is a protocol for secure communication over the Internet. Google also uses it as ranking signal because websites which protect their visitors with HTTPS may be more trustworthy.
